Translations.Text: sedentary gxoj their rest messenger DI hated strive their mon their viv en ig DI! Ili dir not mobilize en this hejt! Dir fajr Infer est mult hotter ili nur comprehend
Let them rid a malpli cry a lot! This est requital pek ili earned

Di returns vi situaci kie ili pet your permission mobilize vi vi dir Vi do gxi neniam re mobilize me nor testament vi ever batal me any enemy Vi chosen est kun sedentary en des 1 met. Do vi rest kun des sedentary
Vi ne observ funeral prayer any da them when li mort nor shall vi star his grave Ili disbelieved DI His messenger mort sxtat wickedness
Ne impon their mon their infan; DI kauxz these est sources mizer them en this mond their anim depart disbelievers
When sura revealed sxtat Kred en DI strive His messenger ecx fort among them dir rest behind
Ili chose est kun des sedentary. Consequently their kor sigel tiel ili ne comprehend
As por messenger those kred him ili eagerly strive their mon their viv These ind all bon ajx; ili est winners
DI prepar them GXARDEN FLU streams wherein ILI abide forever This est greatest triumf
